attributes.action: Take tougher action against those who sell and/or abuse anabolic steroids
attributes.additional_details: What do Dale Cregan, Raoul Moat & Darren Williams have in common apart from being cold blooded murderers? They all abused anabolic steroids. I believe that it is about time that tougher action is taken against those who distributed and/or abuse anabolic steroids. Drug testing should occur  so that all abusers especially those working in confrontational occupations are prevented from doing so before they harm a member of the public.
